issue.title: [Packaging] Stop to use deprecated BuildRoot and Group in .rpm
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3129](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3129). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
They are deprecated
https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Packaging:Guidelines says the followings:

> - The BuildRoot: tag, Group: tag, and %clean section SHOULD NOT be used.
